Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Analyte(s): Most clinically significant aerobic Gram-negative bacilli
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Automated quantitative and qualitative antimicrobial susceptibility testing
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for bioMerieux VITEK® COMPACT PRO automated antimicrobial susceptibility and organism identification system
Indications for Use Summary: Automated quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial susceptibility testing and identification of clinically significant aerobic and anaerobic bacteria and yeasts from isolated colonies
